content: this little buddy works up fairly quick using small amounts of yarn & minimal sewing hat beard & shamrock we will be working top to bottom and in the round unless noted otherwise materials/tools worsted weight yarn in your colors of choice safety eyes pair of 9mm eyes or whatever size is appropriate for the hook and yarn you choose fiberfill stuffing hook d/3 25mm you can use whatever size you desire providing that you cannot see your stuffing yarn needle stitch marker crochet terms/special stitches magic_ring magic_ring chain - chain st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet flo front loop only increase increase work 2 sts in the same space decrease decrease using the invisible method pick up the flo of next 2 sts yarn over & pull through 2 loops x2 4tcbs 4 treble_crochet bobble stitch yarn over x2 insert hook into st yarn over & pull through st yarn over & pull through 2 loops yarn over & pull through 2 loops x4 yarn over & pull through all 5 loops on hook 2dcbs 2 double_crochet bobble stitch yarn over insert hook into st yarn over & pull through yarn over pull thorough 2 loops x2 yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on hook
